channel.title: [PI] Commands Help [PI]
channel.description:
Okay Guys, My Server Is Now Online(Thanks To You All) But I Am Having Problems With My Commands.. There All Just Fucked Up... Here Is My Whole Commands.java File: http://pastebin.com/USpSDVha Please Just Replace It Or Help Me Fix It.. I Don't Want Any Special Commands.. I Just Want The Ones You Need Like; Ban, Ipban, Unban, Mute, Ipmute, Pickup, Players, xteletome, Xteleto, unmute, Yell, Tele, Update And Staffzone! And Thats Really It.... Please Help Me :)
[center] BACE ______ Project Insanity Tragedy Pking[/center]
